description:
Main purpose of the job:

  • Overall responsibility for AM methodology implementation, structuring and support the AM Pillar in the factories. Standardization of methods and tools among the AM Pillar in the factories. AM assessments of the Pillars and AWG?s in the factories.
  • Elaborate a Market AM management model, to ensure the consistent implementation of TPM in alignment with the indications provided by CO-OP and the AM Corporate Master Pillar Leader.

 

Responsibilities:

  • Align the integration among TPM and existing line management routines to guarantee the consistent methodological, strategic and systemic management of operations.
  • Develop Management Routines of AM pillar
  • Perform the follow-up of master plan of AM
  • Spread AM methodology
  • Develop and improve tools and audits for the AM steps
  • Benchmarking of factories according to pillar implementation
  • Develop and Perform trainings for pillars
  • Carry out visits in the factories for analysing gaps, supporting the factory and creating alignment
  • Lead and organize the master pillar meetings
  • Assessment of the AM pillar progress every 6 month
  • Provide templates, forms and layouts
  • Coach the AM pillar leader at factory level in terms of TPM
  • Cooperate with other initiatives and Departments (e.g. NIMS)

Requirements:

  • University degree;
  • At least 3 years Factory experience
  • Experience in TPM implementation
  • Experience as a AM Pillar leader preferred
  • In depth knowledge of TPM
  • Production management experience at factory department level
  • Good understanding of the business needs
  • Familiar with change management techniques
  • Fluent English
  • Ready for business trips
  • Proficient with Problem solving techniques (DMAIC etc.).
name: TPM Autonomous Maintenance Market Pillar Leader
